projects.name: Ecommerce Website
projects.description: Front End and Back End Development Tech Stack: JavaScript, Node.js Express.js, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB : GIT, Visual studio, bootstrap, Postman, JIRA : HTML5, CSS, ReactJS, NodeJS, Express Js, Tailwind CSS : C, C++, JavaScript  Frontend development using reactjs for creating interactive and responsive user interfaces.  Backend implementation built using Node.js and Express.js to handle API integrations, and database operations.  Database management utilized MongoDB as the database to store and manage product information and user data.  User authentication: Implemented user authentication and authorization using Sessions and JWT.  Product catalog, shopping cart functionality: Created a product catalog with features like search, filtering, and sorting.

projects.name: Real Time Chat Application
projects.description: The Real-Time Chat Application is a web-based messaging platform that allows users to communicate with each other in real- time. The app is built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and Socket.io to enable seamless, bi-directional communication between clients and the server. Users can join different chat rooms, send messages, and receive instant updates without the need for page refreshing.

experiences.description: Developed scalable applications using Html, CSS, JavaScript optimizing database operations and enhancing application performance.  Worked on various backend technology including NodeJS, ExpressJs  Implemented comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, ensuring the quality and reliability of the software.
